content.html: Really stupid idea: you can detect deprecation by trying to create a lambda with each runtime you're interested in. If you want to detect phase 2 deprecation you'll need a lambda of each runtime and try to update the code periodically...
content.value: Really stupid idea: you can detect deprecation by trying to create a lambda with each runtime you're interested in. If you want to detect phase 2 deprecation you'll need a lambda of each runtime and try to update the code periodically...
